explains: n. 挫折，阻碍；（建筑）壁阶；<美>（建筑物的）缩进距离

sentences.en: It is an unexpected setback in her fortunes.
sentences.cn: 这是她好运中的一次意外的挫折。

sentences.en: A further reduction in local supplies is yet another unwelcome setback to the industry.
sentences.cn: 本地供应的进一步减少，然而这是该行业又一个不受欢迎的挫折。

sentences.en: Confronted by a setback such as a disappointing test grade, students with a growth mind-set said they would study harder or try a different strategy.
sentences.cn: 面对诸如令人失望的考试成绩之类的挫折，具有成长型思维模式的学生表示，他们会更加努力地学习，或者尝试不同的策略。
